sentences.sentence: Vertebrate Brains consist of the hindbrain (rhombencephalon), midbrain (mesencephalon), and forebrain (prosencephalon).
sentences.translation: 高等脊椎动物的脑包括后脑、中脑和前脑。

sentences.sentence: Results All three subtypes of dopamine receptors were expressed in neurospheres both from mesencephalon and from hippocampus.
sentences.translation: 结果在神经球细胞中三种多巴胺受体均有表达，中脑与海马来源的神经球细胞无显著差异。

sentences.sentence: In the mesencephalon, OXB-IR fibers were located in the central gray substance, superior and inferior colliculi, interpeduncular nucleus and raphe nuclei.
sentences.translation: 在中脑分布于中脑中央灰质、前丘、后丘、脚间核和中缝核；
